name: Dead Drop
description: Dead Drop is a tense two-player game of espionage and deception, where one player has to blend into a crowd and mimic AI movement to avoid detection from the other player.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.0GHz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Onboard Graphics Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Basically a toaster can run this
